process.title: Process
process.subtitle: crafting bold visuals that inspire and elevate brands with thought process.

step1.title: Define Your Vision
step1.description: Find the perfect plan tailored to your needs, offering the right balance of features, flexibility, and value to help you achieve your goals effortlessly.

step2.title: Submit Your Request
step2.description: Easily submit your design requirements through our private design portal, ensuring a seamless process where your vision is understood, refined, and brought to life with precision and creativity.

step3.title: Project Delivered
step3.description: As a dedicated freelancer, I ensure your project is completed with precision and delivered within 2-3 days. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for quality, I bring your vision to lifeâ€”on time and beyond expectations.

testimonials.title: Client Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from clients who trusted my design expertise to elevate their brands successfully.

maazouzAhmed.name: MAAZOUZ AHMED
maazouzAhmed.quote: Adam brought real value to Maazouz Export. His creativity in design helped us present our brand in a modern, engaging way. What impressed me most was his ability to transform ideas into visuals that not only looked great but also communicated our message clearly. A talented professional I strongly recommend.

studyInItaly.name: CEO, StudyInItaly
studyInItaly.quote: Collaborating with Adam was a game-changer for our online presence. He brought fresh creativity to our Instagram of 55K+ followers, producing videos, posts, and scripts that connected deeply with our audience. His mix of design skills and storytelling made every piece of content both engaging and effective. Truly an asset to any team.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with me. Can't find what you're looking for? Feel free to reach out.

q1.question: What is your design process?
q1.answer: My design process follows a structured approach: Discovery & Research, Concept & Strategy, Design & Development, and Delivery & Launch. Each phase is carefully planned to ensure the best possible outcome for your project.

q2.question: How long does a typical project take?
q2.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A logo design typically takes 1-2 weeks, while a complete brand identity can take 4-6 weeks. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

q3.question: Do you work with international clients?
q3.answer: Yes, I work with clients worldwide. I'm based in Algeria but have experience collaborating with international brands across different time zones. All communication is conducted in English.

q4.question: What file formats do you provide?
q4.answer: I provide all necessary file formats for your project, including vector files (AI, EPS, SVG), raster files (PNG, JPG), and print-ready files (PDF). I also include style guides and brand guidelines when applicable.

q5.question: Do you offer revisions?
q5.answer: Yes, I include 2-3 rounds of revisions in my standard packages to ensure you're completely satisfied with the final result. Additional revisions can be arranged if needed.

q6.question: How do we get started?
q6.answer: Simply reach out through the contact form or WhatsApp. I'll schedule a free consultation to discuss your project, understand your needs, and provide a detailed proposal with timeline and pricing.
